News About Spencer

On College Campuses, Social Media Provides Private Spaces for Thousands

(2/20/20) A New York Times article in which Spencer was interviewed about the successful social media pages he ran during college.

‘Sad Reax Only’: Undressing UC Berkeley meme culture

(11/15/19) A Daily Californian article in which Spencer is interviewed about his role in and opinions on social media culture at UC Berkeley.

Bear Pod episode 2: Confessions

(3/29/19) An episode of a podcast run by the Daily Californian featuring Spencer discussing the ins and outs of his successful Confessions from UC Berkeley page.

‘A more honest page’: Confessions from UC Berkeley

(10/13/18) A Daily Californian article about the implications and impacts of Spencer’s Confessions from UC Berkeley page.

Butte County teen named National Merit Scholarship finalist

(9/11/15) An Oroville Mercury-Register article about Spencer’s test score achievement on the PSAT.

Teenager heads to Oregon to hear orchestra perform a symphony he composed

(4/12/2013) An Oroville Mercury-Register article about Spencer’s first full-length symphony being performed in part by the Marylhurst Symphony Orchestra.

News Edited By Spencer

The Roadrunner

(10/1/15 - 5/17/16) Between Volume 28 Issue 1 and Volume 29 Issue 4, Spencer served as Editor-In-Chief, Designer, and columnist for The Roadrunner, the Butte College student newspaper.

Spencer Mowdy Hill is a data scientist, musician, and board game enthusiast born in San Francisco, CA.
